content: It’s important to add realistic things that you can do on your own to help you to stay safe and not act on any suicidal thoughts or urges. These strategies can be as creative or as simple as you’d like. Be sure to list strategies that you will be able to do fairly easily.

Feel free to add from the list of coping strategies provided, or to add tools from this app, if you have found those to be helpful for you. You can also work with your provider to find coping strategies that work for you.
Here are some examples of what other people have written:
Watch Netflix: Stand-up comedians, sci-fi, or adventure movies
Exercise: Use my rowing machine and free weights
Say something kind to myself: You are worth it
Read: People magazine, autobiographies by comedians
Listen to: Paul Simon's Graceland album
Sing: Elvis Presley, The B-52s, Adele
Play with apps on my phone: Bejeweled Blitz, Crossword Puzzles
Tip: You can arrange your list in order of how likely you are to use the tool by pressing and holding an item on the list and dragging it up or down.
